GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v5.15.75
GSD.description:
platform/chrome: fix memory corruption in ioctl

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit fd1d3b265784a2243fcaef06aebfb2f8ee733cec, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit eda2e30c6684d67288edb841c6125d48c608a242. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: platform/chrome: fix memory corruption in ioctl
